verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> Fear <S%H3372><s%> not, neither <S%H408><s%> be you dismayed: <S%H2865><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> with you, and arise, <S%H6965><s%> go <S%H5927><s%> up to Ai: <S%H5857><s%> see, <S%H7200><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> into your hand <S%H3027><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Ai, <S%H5857><s%> and his people, <S%H5971><s%> and his city, <S%H5892><s%> and his land: <S%H776><s%>

And you shall do <S%H6213><s%> to Ai <S%H5857><s%> and her king <S%H4428><s%> as you did <S%H6213><s%> to Jericho <S%H3405><s%> and her king: <S%H4428><s%> only <S%H7535><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%> thereof, and the cattle <S%H929><s%> thereof, shall you take for a prey <S%H962><s%> to yourselves: lay <S%H7760><s%> you an ambush <S%H693><s%> for the city <S%H5892><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> it.

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> arose, <S%H6965><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of war, <S%H4421><s%> to go <S%H5927><s%> up against Ai: <S%H5857><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> chose <S%H977><s%> out thirty <S%H7970><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> mighty <S%H1368><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of valor, <S%H2428><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> them away by night. <S%H3915><s%>

And he commanded <S%H6680><s%> them, saying, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H7200><s%> you shall lie <S%H693><s%> in wait <S%H693><s%> against the city, <S%H5892><s%> even behind <S%H310><s%> the city: <S%H5892><s%> go <S%H7368><s%> not very <S%H3966><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from the city, <S%H5892><s%> but be you all <S%H3605><s%> ready: <S%H3559><s%>

And I, and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that are with me, will approach <S%H7126><s%> to the city: <S%H5892><s%> and it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when <S%H3588><s%> they come <S%H3318><s%> out against <S%H7125><s%> us, as at the first, <S%H7223><s%> that we will flee <S%H5127><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them,

(For they will come <S%H3318><s%> out after <S%H310><s%> us) till <S%H5704><s%> we have drawn <S%H5423><s%> them from the city; <S%H5892><s%> for they will say, <S%H559><s%> They flee <S%H5127><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> us, as at the first: <S%H7223><s%> therefore we will flee <S%H5127><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them.

Then you shall rise <S%H6965><s%> up from the ambush, <S%H693><s%> and seize <S%H3423><s%> on the city: <S%H5892><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will deliver <S%H5414><s%> it into your hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And it shall be, when you have taken <S%H8610><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> that you shall set <S%H3341><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> on fire: <S%H784><s%> according to the commandment <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall you do. <S%H6213><s%> See, <S%H7200><s%> I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> you.

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> therefore sent <S%H7971><s%> them forth: and they went <S%H3212><s%> to lie in ambush, <S%H693><s%> and stayed <S%H3427><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Bethel <S%H1008><s%> and Ai, <S%H5857><s%> on the west <S%H3220><s%> side of Ai: <S%H5857><s%> but Joshua <S%H3091><s%> lodged <S%H3885><s%> that night <S%H3915><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> rose <S%H7925><s%> up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and numbered <S%H6485><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> and went <S%H5927><s%> up, he and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> to Ai. <S%H5857><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> even the people <S%H5971><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> that were with him, went <S%H5927><s%> up, and drew near, <S%H5066><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> side of Ai: <S%H5857><s%> now there was a valley <S%H1516><s%> between <S%H996><s%> them and Ai. <S%H5857><s%>

And he took <S%H3947><s%> about five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> and set <S%H7760><s%> them to lie in ambush <S%H693><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Bethel <S%H1008><s%> and Ai, <S%H5857><s%> on the west <S%H3220><s%> side of the city. <S%H5892><s%>

And when they had set <S%H7760><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> even all <S%H3605><s%> the host <S%H4264><s%> that was on the north <S%H6828><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> and their liers in wait <S%H6119><s%> on the west <S%H3220><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> that night <S%H3915><s%> into the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the valley. <S%H6010><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when the king <S%H4428><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> it, that they hurried <S%H4116><s%> and rose <S%H7925><s%> up early, <S%H7925><s%> and the men <S%H582><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out against <S%H7125><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> to battle, <S%H4421><s%> he and all <S%H3605><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> at a time appointed, <S%H4150><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the plain; <S%H6160><s%> but he knew <S%H3045><s%> not that there were liers in ambush <S%H693><s%> against him behind <S%H310><s%> the city. <S%H5892><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> made as if they were beaten <S%H5060><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them, and fled <S%H5127><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that were in Ai <S%H5892><s%> were called <S%H2199><s%> together to pursue <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them: and they pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and were drawn <S%H5423><s%> away from the city. <S%H5892><s%>

And there was not a man <S%H376><s%> left <S%H7604><s%> in Ai <S%H5857><s%> or Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> that went <S%H3318><s%> not out after <S%H310><s%> Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and they left <S%H5800><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> open, <S%H6605><s%> and pursued <S%H7291><s%> after Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> Stretch <S%H5186><s%> out the spear <S%H3591><s%> that is in your hand <S%H3027><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> Ai; <S%H5857><s%> for I will give <S%H5414><s%> it into your hand. <S%H3027><s%> And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> stretched <S%H5186><s%> out the spear <S%H3591><s%> that he had in his hand <S%H3027><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the city. <S%H5892><s%>

And the ambush <S%H693><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> quickly <S%H4120><s%> out of their place, <S%H4725><s%> and they ran <S%H7323><s%> as soon as he had stretched <S%H5186><s%> out his hand: <S%H3027><s%> and they entered <S%H935><s%> into the city, <S%H5892><s%> and took <S%H3920><s%> it, and hurried <S%H4116><s%> and set the city <S%H5892><s%> on fire. <S%H784><s%>

And when the men <S%H582><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%> looked <S%H6437><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> them, they saw, <S%H7200><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the smoke <S%H6227><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> ascended <S%H5927><s%> up to heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and they had no <S%H3808><s%> power <S%H3027><s%> to flee <S%H5127><s%> this <S%H2007><s%> way <S%H2008><s%> or that way: <S%H2008><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> that fled <S%H5127><s%> to the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> turned <S%H2015><s%> back <S%H2015><s%> on the pursuers. <S%H7291><s%>

And when Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that the ambush <S%H693><s%> had taken <S%H3920><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> and that the smoke <S%H6227><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> ascended, <S%H5927><s%> then they turned <S%H7725><s%> again, <S%H7725><s%> and slew <S%H5221><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> of Ai. <S%H5857><s%>

And the other <S%H428><s%> issued <S%H3318><s%> out of the city <S%H5892><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> them; so they were in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> some <S%H428><s%> on this <S%H2088><s%> side, and some <S%H428><s%> on that side: and they smote <S%H5221><s%> them, so <S%H5704><s%> that they let none <S%H1115><s%> of them remain <S%H8300><s%> or escape. <S%H6412><s%>
And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%> they took <S%H8610><s%> alive, <S%H2416><s%> and brought <S%H7126><s%> him to Joshua. <S%H3091><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when Israel <S%H3478><s%> had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of slaying <S%H2026><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> they chased <S%H7291><s%> them, and when they were all <S%H3605><s%> fallen <S%H5307><s%> on the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> they were consumed, <S%H8552><s%> that all <S%H3605><s%> the Israelites <S%H3478><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to Ai, <S%H5857><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

And so it was, that all <S%H3605><s%> that fell <S%H5307><s%> that day, <S%H3117><s%> both of men <S%H376><s%> and women, <S%H802><s%> were twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> thousand, <S%H505><s%> even all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> of Ai. <S%H5857><s%>

For Joshua <S%H3091><s%> drew <S%H7725><s%> not his hand <S%H3027><s%> back, <S%H7725><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> he stretched <S%H5186><s%> out the spear, <S%H3591><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he had utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Ai. <S%H5857><s%>

Only <S%H7535><s%> the cattle <S%H929><s%> and the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of that city <S%H5892><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> took for a prey <S%H962><s%> to themselves, <S%H1992><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he commanded <S%H6680><s%> Joshua. <S%H3091><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> burnt <S%H8313><s%> Ai, <S%H5857><s%> and made <S%H7760><s%> it an heap <S%H8510><s%> for ever, <S%H5769><s%> even a desolation <S%H8077><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%> he hanged <S%H8518><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> a tree <S%H6086><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> eventide: <S%H6256><s%> <S%H6153><s%> and as soon as the sun <S%H8121><s%> was down, <S%H935><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> that they should take <S%H3381><s%> his carcass <S%H5038><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from the tree, <S%H6086><s%> and cast <S%H7993><s%> it at <S%H413><s%> the entering <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> and raise <S%H6965><s%> thereon <S%H5921><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> heap <S%H1530><s%> of stones, <S%H68><s%> that remains to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>
Then <S%H227><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Ebal, <S%H5858><s%>

As Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> as it is written <S%H3789><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses, <S%H4872><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> of whole <S%H8003><s%> stones, <S%H68><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> which <S%H834><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> man has lift <S%H5130><s%> up any iron: <S%H1270><s%> and they offered <S%H5927><s%> thereon <S%H5921><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings.

And he wrote <S%H3789><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> on the stones <S%H68><s%> a copy <S%H4932><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses, <S%H4872><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he wrote <S%H3789><s%> in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and their elders, <S%H2205><s%> and officers, <S%H7860><s%> and their judges, <S%H8199><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> on this <S%H2088><s%> side the ark <S%H727><s%> and on that side before <S%H5048><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> which bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> as well the stranger, <S%H1616><s%> as he that was born <S%H249><s%> among them; half <S%H2677><s%> of them over <S%H413><s%> against <S%H4136><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Gerizim, <S%H1630><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> of them over <S%H413><s%> <S%H4136><s%> against <S%H4136><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Ebal; <S%H5858><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> before, <S%H7223><s%> that they should bless <S%H1288><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And afterward <S%H310><s%> <S%H3651><s%> he read <S%H7121><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the law, <S%H8451><s%> the blessings <S%H1293><s%> and cursings, <S%H7045><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that is written <S%H3789><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the law. <S%H8451><s%>

There was not a word <S%H1697><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded, <S%H6680><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> read <S%H7121><s%> not before <S%H5048><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> with the women, <S%H802><s%> and the little <S%H2945><s%> ones, and the strangers <S%H1616><s%> that were conversant <S%H1980><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> them.
